meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tender.
meanings.sent1: Her tendresses towards animals showed her gentle nature.
meanings.sent2: The tendresses of the baby's touch melted everyone's heart.
meanings.sent3: The tendresses of the fluffy puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The tendresses of the morning sun warmed the earth gently.
meanings.sent5: The tendresses of the flower petals felt like a soft caress.

meanings.definition: Acts or expressions of affection or kindness.
meanings.sent1: His tendresses towards his sister were always evident.
meanings.sent2: The tendresses of a hug can convey more than words.
meanings.sent3: The tendresses of a surprise gift made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: The tendresses of a handwritten note touched her heart deeply.
meanings.sent5: The tendresses of a smile can light up a room.
